text: Tömük Creek (also called Karakız) is an irregular-flow creek in Turkey. It is in Erdemli ilçe (district) of Mersin Province. The upper reaches are in Toros Mountains at altitude. However, after the construction of Karakız Lake now it is fed by the lake Page of Mersin governate Its main course is toward south east. After flowing through Karahıdırlı and Tömük it flows to Mediterranean Sea at . The creek supplies the water to the agricultural area around Tömük Altınsahil page ==References== Category:Rivers of Turkey Category:Rivers of Mersin Province Category:Erdemli District
title: Tömük Creek
